select u.id,u.nickname,u.email,u.create_time,u.last_login_time,u.status,u.salt ,group_concat(ur.name) roleNames,group_concat(ur.id)roleIds from sys_user u left join sys_user_role uur on uur.uid = u.id left join sys_role ur on ur.id = uur.rid
and ( LOWER(u.nickname) like LOWER(CONCAT("%",#{findContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")) or LOWER(u.email) like LOWER(CONCAT("%",#{findContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")) )
group by u.id
select ur.id,ur.name,ur.type,ifnull(uur.uid,0) marker from sys_role ur left join(select * from sys_user_role where uid=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}) uur on uur.rid = ur.id
